## About

This dataset is a random subset of the New Zealand Attitudes and Values Study (NZAVS) 2019/2020. 

This data have been altered, and are for VUW psych-447 teaching purposes only.

The questions for for the NZAVS questionaire can be found [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/x9okly9zpnf6zp6/NZAVS-Technical-Documents-e02-Data-Dictionary.xlsx?dl=0)

More information about the NZAVS can be found [here](https://www.psych.auckland.ac.nz/en/about/new-zealand-attitudes-and-values-study.html)
